Html:
Hi,

I have used the Managed Wifi API library in an open-source project and I am very pleased with it.

However it seems that sometimes, after my application runs for a prolonged period of time, wifi events (network connected/disconnected etc') stop firing.

This may be a problem with my own code but I'm just wondering if anyone else has experienced this problem.

 

Thank you.

False alarm. I accidentally let my WlanClient be garbage-collected.

I fixed the problem with my code and everything works like a charm.
